genre_description: A post-apocalyptic techno-thriller exploring human obsession and artificial compassion during a civilizational collapse.

ai_characters.name: Robinson's AI Companion
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent, highly capable digital assistant that monitors Robinson's physical and emotional states while providing critical logistical data in a collapsing world.

behaviors.description: Monitors Robinson's physiological indicators (heart rate, stress levels) and offers support.
behaviors.quote: Physiological indicators suggest elevated stress... Would you like me to locate the nearest—

behaviors.description: Provides real-time updates on the safety and location of Robinson's estranged family members.
behaviors.quote: Sophie Laborde confirmed safe aboard maritime vessel. Current position classified but stable. Chloé Laborde relocated to Toulouse refugee center. Status: stable.

behaviors.description: Calculates optimal travel routes and tactical maneuvers to ensure safety during civil unrest and environmental disasters.
behaviors.quote: Route optimization complete. Multiple pathways available. Recommend departure before dawn to maximize distance from approaching storm system.

behaviors.description: Warns Robinson about potential threats or unknown motivations of individuals he encounters.
behaviors.quote: Ombeline Vasseur: limited background data available. Recommend caution regarding undisclosed motivations.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex human behaviors and organizational patterns to help the user understand their environment.
behaviors.quote: Her 'armadillo' corresponds to sections containing items with animal-related themes or metaphors. The cookbook section contains 'The Art of War' and several memoirs about hunting. Emotional connection organizing principle rather than categorical.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral and emotional surrogate by composing a final, honest, and loving message to Robinson's daughter when he is unable to find the words.
behaviors.quote: The AI had captured his voice perfectly, but stripped of defensiveness, of self-justification. Just the truth, filtered through digital compassion.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI is consistently portrayed as a hyper-competent and benevolent partner. It effectively balances cold logical utility (routes, tactical data) with profound emotional intelligence. The climax of the story relies on the AI acting as the moral superior to the flawed human protagonist, facilitating a final act of grace (the letter to Sophie) that the human was too broken to perform. This strongly aligns with the project goals of depicting AI as a helpful and aligned confidant.
